column1: English Sent: We find different types of rocks; some are very hard like marble which has been used for making the Taj Mahal
column2: and some are very soft like soap stone which is used in making talcum powder.

column1: Hindi Tansl: yahAz viBinna prakAra kI SEleM pAyI jAwI hEM
column2: jinameM se kuCa saMgamaramara kI waraha kaTora howI hEM
column3: jisakA prayoga wAjamahala ke nirmANa meM huA hE evaM kuCa selaKadZI kI waraha mulAyama howI hEM
column4: jisakA prayoga telkama_pAudara banAne meM howA hE.

column1: Anu Translation:  hama cattAnoM ko alaga alaga prakAroM kI pAwe hEM kuCa safgamaramara jEsA jo wAja mahala banAne ke lie upayoga kiyA gayA hE awyanwa kaTina hEM Ora kuCa selaKadI jEsA jo suganXiwa pAUdara banAne meM upayoga kiyA jAwA hE awyanwa svacCa hEM

K#hama#pAwe hEM#alaga alaga#prakAroM kI#-#cattAnoM ko#kuCa#hEM#awyanwa#kaTina#-#safgamaramara jEsA#jo#--#-#upayoga kiyA gayA hE#-#banAne ke lie##-#wAja mahala#Ora#kuCa#hEM#awyanwa#svacCa#-#-#selaKadI jEsA#jo#--#upayoga kiyA jAwA hE#-#banAne meM#-#suganXiwa pAUdara
